replies.author: 寸@草心
replies.txt_content:
哦哦，变量啊
%ticks% tps
%ping% 网络延迟
%online% 在线人数
%free_ram% 可用内存
%used%ram% 已用内存
%max_ram% 满内存数值
%used_ram% 已用内存数值
%date% 日期
%time% (world time) 时间
%lifetime% (how long a player lived since his last death) 游戏里时间
%exp% 经验值
%xp_to_level% (how many xp he need for the next experience level) 升级所需经验
%last_damage%
%max_player%
%first_day%
%first_month%
